alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale; Neshoba; Newton; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 4:28AM CDT until March 12 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN NEWTON...KEMPER...EAST CENTRAL SCOTT...SOUTHERN NESHOBA AND LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 428 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gholson to near House to near Conehatta, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Damascus around 435 AM CDT. Liberty and Prismatic around 440 AM CDT. Duffee, Blackwater, Daleville and Electric Mills around 445 AM CDT. Suqualena and Martin around 450 AM CDT. Meridian and Nellieburg around 455 AM CDT. Marion, Porterville and Tamola around 500 AM CDT. Meridian Station around 505 AM CDT. Lauderdale and Toomsuba around 510 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Scooba and Sebastopol. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
